Table1.News content: California has released guidance for people traveling into and out of the state.

Table1.News title: When it comes to COVID-19 vaccines, California will continue to be led by science and data
Table1.News content: The COVID-19 Vaccination Scientific Safety Review Workgroup will review FDA-approved vaccines. They’ll work to ensure vaccines are safe and distributed equitably.

Table1.News title: Flu season is around the corner
Table1.News content: Simultaneous outbreaks of flu and COVID-19 will drain the state’s health care resources. Getting a flu shot protects you and your family.
Table1.Link text: Find a flu shot near you
